random.cdisc.data 0.1.2.1
  • Reference

Concomitant Medication Analysis Dataset (ADCM)

radcm.Rd

Function for generating random Concomitant Medication Analysis Dataset for a given Subject-Level Analysis Dataset.

radcm(ADSL, max_n_cms = 10, seed = NULL, lookup = NULL)

Arguments

ADSL

Subject-Level Analysis Dataset (ADSL).
max_n_cms

maximum number of concommitant medications per patient.
seed

Seed for random number generation.
lookup

Data.frame containing additional parameters.

Value

data.frame

Details

One record per each record in the corresponding SDTM domain.

Keys: STUDYID USUBJID CMSTDTM CMTERM CMSEQ.

Examples

ADSL <- radsl(seed = 1)
ADCM <- radcm(ADSL, seed = 2)
head(ADCM)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 21
#>   STUDYID USUBJID SUBJID SITEID   AGE SEX   RACE  COUNTRY ARM   ARMCD ACTARM
